ProductInfo.Features:
Includes EOS Rebel T3i digital SLR camera and EF-S 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Type II Lens; 18.0 megapixel CMOS sensor; Eye-level SLR viewfinder
3.0-inch Vari-Angle Clear View LCD; Built-in flash; Full HD movie mode at 1920 x 1080 resolution
DIGIC 4 Image Processor; Scene Intelligent Auto mode and Picture Style Auto incorporate EOS Scene Detection System; Advanced imaging features: Basic+ function, Multi-Aspect function and Creative Filters
Compatible with full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses. USB 2.0 terminal; Video out terminal: NTSC/PAL selectable; SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card slot (card not included)
Kit Includes: Canon T3i 18-135mm Kit, Canon 75-300mm Lens, Nice Camera Bag, Tripod, 3 Piece Filter Kit, Remote Trigger, 32 GB High Speed Memory Card, Memory Card Wallet.
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging with EF-S 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Standard Zoom Lens + 75-300mm Lens + 32 GB Master Kit
